by.it.rent.dao

Interface UserDAO


  • public interface UserDAO
    The user of this interface can update, create and get data about Users from Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tanya Livanivich

      • authorization

        by.it.rent.bean.User authorization(java.lang.String login,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws by.it.rent.dao.DAOException
        Contribute getting data about user by its login and password
        Parameters:
        login - User login entered during authorization
        password - User password entered during authorization
        Returns:
        User object if user with such login and password exists, otherwise returns null.
        Throws:
        by.it.rent.dao.DAOException
